Sentencas: The distributed power generation of methanol steam reforming reactor combined with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has the characteristics of outstanding economic advantages.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: In this paper, a methanol steam reforming reactor was designed which integrates catalyst combustion, vaporization and reforming.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: By catalyst combustion, it can achieve stable operation to supply fuel for kW-class SOFC in real time without additional heating equipment.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The optimal operating condition of the reforming reactor is 523-553 K, and the steam to carbon ratio (S/C) is 1.2.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: To study the reforming performance, methanol steam reforming (MSR), methanol decomposition (MD), water-gas shift (WGS) were considered.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: Operating temperature is the greatest factor affecting reforming performance.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The higher the reaction temperature, the lower the H2 and CO2, the higher the CO and the methanol conversion rate.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The methanol conversion rate is up to 95.03%.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The higher the liquid space velocity (LHSV), the lower the methanol conversion rate, the lowest is 90.7%.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The tem-perature changes of the reforming reactor caused by the load change of stack takes about 30 min to reach new balance.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: Local hotspots within the reforming reactor lead to an excessive local temperature to test a small amount of CH4 in the reforming gas.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The methanation reaction cannot be ignored at the operating temperature.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The reforming gas contains 70-75% H2, 3-8% CO, 18-22% CO2 and 0.0004-0.3% CH4.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: Trace amounts of C2H6 and C2H4 are also found in some experiments.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC

Sentencas: The reforming reactor can stably supply the fuel for up to 1125 W SOFC.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of methanol steam reforming reactor heated by catalyst combustion for kW-class SOFC
